post.body:
I'm sure it is just a coincidence that The Washington Post published a hit piece about Gab 1 day before PA shooting.
Then the very next day CBS News has a hit piece ready to air very shortly after shooting.
AND PayPal, who does nothing quickly, removes Gab a few hours after shooting. 
LOT of coincidences @a

post.body: Dan Patterson, CNET Senior Producer."[Gab is] wrapping the moniker of free speech around hate speech. And look: Expressions of antisemitism, racism, sexism, homophobia--these are not air quote 'free speech.' In fact these are expressions of bigotry and very clearly anti-American. These are indisputably the ideas of repression, the very opposite of free speech. These ideas repress and are designed to shut down truly American ideas, like the freedom to worship and celebrate your religion without the threat of or actual violence."https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GHfFAevq8Cg Where to start?Ideas and speech repress nobody.Gab has a "mute" function. I use it all the time. If I can't HEAR Jew-haters, then their slobbering hate makes no impression on me.The First Amendment ALLOWS you to express bigotry. That freedom is indisputably AMERICAN.Twitter has become notorious for assassination tweets, such as the one I've attached to this post. Twitter says that these tweets don't violate their Terms of Use, even though they are FEDERAL FELONIES.Leftists HATE conservatives, and they express that hate all the time. They even act on it, such as when that pumpkin-headed Bernie Bro almost killed Steve Scalise. Here's a defining characteristic of leftism:Leftists want the freedom to hate AND to act on that hate, which is why they say, "Words are violence." If you listen to Antifa, they say that smashing you in the face is self-defense. Your words as harming them, so that gives them the right to physically assault you.We may see Gab shut down over this. I hope not. Even though I despise Jew-haters, I just mute them. They disappear. And Twitter has an order of magnitude MORE Jew-haters. One night over 500 of them came after me.And I defeated them all. Their stupid words didn't hurt me.Dan Patterson is lying his ass off. Twitter and Facebook are the go-to places for Jew-haters. But they're all LEFTIST Jew-haters, so that means they get a pass.When I was a child, my mother told me that sticks and stones would break my bones, but words would never hurt me.Let's ask Dan Patterson and any member of Antifa the following question.Which would you rather I do: address you in bigoted language or throw a rock into your face as hard as I can?Yeah.Words and hate are not the problem.Only actions matter.

post.body: READ ME AND PLEASE REPOST: This is really an unbelievable time to be alive. Gab is under attack once again by the liberal media over a maniac who shot up a synagogue. When will liberals take responsibility for their own personal actions and stop blaming everyone around them for the worlds problems? Stop blaming inanimate objects and cyber space for the actions of insane people who commit horrific acts of violence in the real world. @a needs to stay the course and fight these people with everything he has. He also needs our support. This is a liberal media take down of @Gab occurring in real time. These liberals simply will not live and let live or leave good people alone. This is not an alt-right or Nazi website. This is not a den of hate. This is a free speech website, that is all. Think about how badly these sick people want to control everything. Think about how hard they attack free speech and anything that is different from the narrative they spew 24/7. Today is a very important date in the history of Gab and will be benchmarked as the day Gabbers fought back against the insanity of liberal media and the lies they tell the world without punishment. This is not a call to violence in any way. This is a call for action to get your voice heard and illuminate the lies of the left. Now is the time to make a stand and say no more of this bullshit. It is time to brainstorm ideas and come up with a plan. We are 800K strong. Andrew, how can we help? #Gab #GabFam

parent.body: Breaking: @joyent, Gab’s new hosting provider, has just pulled our hosting service. They have given us until 9am on Monday to find a solution. Gab will likely be down for weeks because of this. Working on solutions. We will never give up on defending free speech for all people.

post.body: I have no guilt and no shame for anything I've said here on Gab.I'm just a shitposter, simple as that.But I'm under no illusion that if the Commies were in power right now, I'd be knees down in a ditch catching a bullet with the back of my head.So that means I'll be fighting for free speech even harder now.

I just had a long prayer session, but saying it nicer. Lord please send your wisdom to @a @e @amq and guide them to resolve these issues. Change the hearts of Joyent.com to give gab more time to buy with their million dollars we just sent them to develop their own hosting site, their own payment system and bless them abundantly to help others have a way to seek help, information and purchasing power. Please give them strength to be a light in the world for a light that is hidden is not seen. Help us overcome our own fears and anger and be a light with them. 
As Judah stood against Israel who had turned to false gods, 2 Chronicle 13, please help us to stay with you, the one true living God and overcome our enemies who try to take us down while claiming blasphemy in your name. 
Please give comfort to those who have suffered the wrath of hate. 
And above all, let gab be used for the glory of the Lord that your message may be expressed here by the fruit of our lips. 
In the name of Jesus, Amen.

post.body:
I'm an American Jew and have been on Gab since the day they started in August 2016. Yes, there are some hateful jerks here speaking freely. But I'm a mature adult and can handle it. I just don't follow them.
The majority of us here on Gab are nice people who want to have Free Speech.

The truth is we do not know yet. We are working on solutions. We will figure it out. Keep fighting for freedom. We sure will be. Please pray for the victims and their families. I know many of you are upset at what is happening to Gab, but the focus should be on them.

post.body: And the hate speech and assassination threats just keep rolling on twitter and Facebook as long as it is republicans as targets it's all good.

parent.body:
Dan Patterson, CNET Senior Producer.

"[Gab is] wrapping the moniker of free speech around hate speech. And look: Expressions of antisemitism, racism, sexism, homophobia--these are not air quote 'free speech.' In fact these are expressions of bigotry and very clearly anti-American. These are indisputably the ideas of repression, the very opposite of free speech. These ideas repress and are designed to shut down truly American ideas, like the freedom to worship and celebrate your religion without the threat of or actual violence."

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GHfFAevq8Cg 

Where to start?

Ideas and speech repress nobody.

Gab has a "mute" function. I use it all the time. If I can't HEAR Jew-haters, then their slobbering hate makes no impression on me.

The First Amendment ALLOWS you to express bigotry. That freedom is indisputably AMERICAN.

Twitter has become notorious for assassination tweets, such as the one I've attached to this post. Twitter says that these tweets don't violate their Terms of Use, even though they are FEDERAL FELONIES.

Leftists HATE conservatives, and they express that hate all the time. They even act on it, such as when that pumpkin-headed Bernie Bro almost killed Steve Scalise. 

Here's a defining characteristic of leftism:

Leftists want the freedom to hate AND to act on that hate, which is why they say, "Words are violence." If you listen to Antifa, they say that smashing you in the face is self-defense. Your words as harming them, so that gives them the right to physically assault you.

We may see Gab shut down over this. I hope not. Even though I despise Jew-haters, I just mute them. They disappear. And Twitter has an order of magnitude MORE Jew-haters. One night over 500 of them came after me.

And I defeated them all. Their stupid words didn't hurt me.

Dan Patterson is lying his ass off. Twitter and Facebook are the go-to places for Jew-haters. 

But they're all LEFTIST Jew-haters, so that means they get a pass.

When I was a child, my mother told me that sticks and stones would break my bones, but words would never hurt me.

Let's ask Dan Patterson and any member of Antifa the following question.

Which would you rather I do: address you in bigoted language or throw a rock into your face as hard as I can?

Yeah.

Words and hate are not the problem.

Only actions matter.

conversation_parent.body:
Dan Patterson, CNET Senior Producer.

"[Gab is] wrapping the moniker of free speech around hate speech. And look: Expressions of antisemitism, racism, sexism, homophobia--these are not air quote 'free speech.' In fact these are expressions of bigotry and very clearly anti-American. These are indisputably the ideas of repression, the very opposite of free speech. These ideas repress and are designed to shut down truly American ideas, like the freedom to worship and celebrate your religion without the threat of or actual violence."

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GHfFAevq8Cg 

Where to start?

Ideas and speech repress nobody.

Gab has a "mute" function. I use it all the time. If I can't HEAR Jew-haters, then their slobbering hate makes no impression on me.

The First Amendment ALLOWS you to express bigotry. That freedom is indisputably AMERICAN.

Twitter has become notorious for assassination tweets, such as the one I've attached to this post. Twitter says that these tweets don't violate their Terms of Use, even though they are FEDERAL FELONIES.

Leftists HATE conservatives, and they express that hate all the time. They even act on it, such as when that pumpkin-headed Bernie Bro almost killed Steve Scalise. 

Here's a defining characteristic of leftism:

Leftists want the freedom to hate AND to act on that hate, which is why they say, "Words are violence." If you listen to Antifa, they say that smashing you in the face is self-defense. Your words as harming them, so that gives them the right to physically assault you.

We may see Gab shut down over this. I hope not. Even though I despise Jew-haters, I just mute them. They disappear. And Twitter has an order of magnitude MORE Jew-haters. One night over 500 of them came after me.

And I defeated them all. Their stupid words didn't hurt me.

Dan Patterson is lying his ass off. Twitter and Facebook are the go-to places for Jew-haters. 

But they're all LEFTIST Jew-haters, so that means they get a pass.

When I was a child, my mother told me that sticks and stones would break my bones, but words would never hurt me.

Let's ask Dan Patterson and any member of Antifa the following question.

Which would you rather I do: address you in bigoted language or throw a rock into your face as hard as I can?

Yeah.

Words and hate are not the problem.

Only actions matter.

embed.html:
Pittsburg shooting suspect was avid user of social network Gab
Pittsburgh shooting suspect Robert Bowers was an avid user of the social media site Gab, which many have accused of being a platform for the alt-right...
